com.nutiteq.components
Class Envelope

java.lang.Object
  com.nutiteq.components.Envelope

public class Envelope
extends java.lang.Object

Bounding area on the map. Can be defined by by horizontal and vertical bounds or by convex bounding polygon. This class is intended for conservative object area estimation and fast intersection testing.

Test if this envelope contains the given point.

Parameters:

contains

public boolean contains(Envelope env)
Test if this envelope fully contains the given envelope.

Parameters:
env - the envelope to test.
Returns:
true when the other envelope is fully contained within this envelope. false otherwise.

covers

public boolean covers(Envelope env)
Test if this envelope fully covers the given envelope. Equivalent to contains() method.

Parameters:
env - the envelope to test.
Returns:
true when the other envelope is fully contained within this envelope. false otherwise.
